Dress me
Visual change equip The .dressme command a new system that gives you the chance to change your armors or weapon or cloak texture to look like a different grade. All normal skins are possible to buy with adena. Specials skins will be shown here and can only be obtained from events, bosses or farming. Some of them can be found at the special shop. When used, they go to your wardrobe you can choose the skin when you want! Remember, Items with skins cannot be traded!
